scripts.rust:build: wasm-pack build ./rust --target web --out-name wasm-internal && yarn rust:postbuild
scripts.rust:postbuild: node scripts/copyWasmBinary.mjs && rm -rf src/pkg && mv rust/pkg src/pkg
scripts.rust:build:debug: wasm-pack build ./rust --target web --dev --out-name wasm-internal && yarn rust:postbuild
